Assessment.QuestionText: Which of these statements about Windows Forms are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: Windows Forms execute on a remote machine.
Windows Forms does not support GDI+.
The application settings feature allows storing only user-defined settings.
The <font face="courier new">ToolStripContainer</font> control is a new control introduced in Windows Forms.
Windows Forms can access a database, which exists on another machine.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(False), (B)-(False), (C)-(False), (D)-(True), and (E)-(True).
